column2: Do you know anyone who is looking to sell their house? I can pay you $1000 for a referral when I purchase their home.
I buy fixer-upper houses in [city, state] and the surrounding areas. I can pay cash and close quickly. No need for any repairs, clean out, or showings.
I buy turn key houses in [city, state] and the surrounding areas. I can pay full price for turn key homes and I'm flexible with the closing. No need for any repairs, clean out, or showings.
